  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0031111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0031111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Palancas</string>
            <string language="en">Levers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hebel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leviers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alavancas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοχλοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica el funcionamiento general de una palanca para poder comprender el funcionamiento del aparato locomotor. Permite el acceso a tres páginas de ampliación que explican con sendas animaciones el funcionamiento de cada tipo de palanca.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the general workings of a lever to be able to understand how the locomotor system works. It gives access to three pages of additional information each with animations explaining how each of type of lever works.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Palancas</string>
            <string language="en">Levers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die allgemeinen Funktionen eines 
Hebels erklärt, um zu können, zu verstehen, wie das lokomotorische 
System arbeitet. Es gibt Zugriff zu drei Seiten zusätzlichen 
Informationen jeden mit den Animationen, die erklären, wie jeder von 
Typen des Hebels arbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant les fonctionnements généraux 
d'un levier pour pouvoir comprendre comment le système locomoteur 
fonctionne. Il donne l'accès à trois pages d'information 
supplémentaire chacun avec des animations expliquant comment chacun 
de type de levier fonctionne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica os funcionamentos gerais de 
uma alavanca para poder  compreender como o sistema locomotor 
trabalha. Dá o acesso a três páginas da informação 
adicional cada um com os animations que explicam como cada um do tipo 
de alavanca trabalha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega i funzionamenti generali di 
una leva per potere capire come il sistema locomotore funziona. 
Dà l'accesso a tre pagine delle informazioni supplementari 
ciascuno con le animazioni che spiegano come ciascuno di tipo di leva 
funziona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τα γενικά έργα ενός μοχλού για να 
είναι σε θέση να καταλάβει πώς το κινητήριο σύστημα λειτουργεί.
Δίνει την πρόσβαση σε τρεις σελίδες των πρόσθετων 
πληροφοριών κάθε μια με τις ζωτικότητες που εξηγούν πώς κάθε 
ένας από τον τύπο μοχλού λειτουργεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hebel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leviers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alavancas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοχλοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
